strongs_def: to seat down, i.e. set (figuratively, appoint); intransitively, to sit (down); figuratively, to settle (hover, dwell)
outline:
1. to make to sit down
    1. to set, appoint, to confer a kingdom on one
  2. intransitively
    1. to sit down
    2. to sit
      1. to have fixed one's abode
      2. to sojourn, to settle, settle down
